{{Infobox Software | name = Reatogo-X-PE | logo = [[Image:Reatogo-X-PE logo.png]] | screenshot = [[Image:Reatogo-X-PE Live CD.png|300px]] | caption = Reatogo-X-PE Live CD | collapsible = | author = | developer = | released = | latest release version = Reatogo-X-PE build 240 | latest release date = {{release date|2006|09|23}} [http://reatogo.de/SUB_Reatogo_Downloads/ReadMe-1.txt] | latest preview version = | latest preview date = | frequently updated = | programming language = | operating system = [[Windows XP]] | platform = | size = | language = | status = | genre = [[Live CD]] | license = | website = [http://www.reatogo.de/ www.reatogo.de] }}
'''Reatogo-X-PE''' is a [[Live CD]] builder. It can create a [[Live CD]] of [[Windows XP]] and is based on [[BartPE]]. Currently (as of June, 2008) it is the most complete Live CD of Windows XP, since it includes Windows Explorer and Internet Explorer, applications other XP Live CDs don't include.
== Limitations == The builder for Reatogo-X-PE runs on Windows Vista but needs to be run under XP SP2 compatibility mode and run as administrator. It only creates XP Live CDs and cannot create Vista Live CDs.
While Reatogo-X-PE has no uninstaller and does not register as an application that can be removed from the Control Panel, it can be "uninstalled" merely by deleting its folder.
== Gallery == <gallery> Image:REATOGO-X-PE builder.png|The tool used to create the Live CDs Image:Reatogo-X-PE Live CD booting.png|Reatogo-X-PE Live CD booting Image:Reatogo-X-PE Live CD loading.png|Reatogo-X-PE Live CD loading Image:Reatogo-X-PE Live CD booted.png|Reatogo-X-PE Live CD booted </gallery>
